key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and semiconductor shortages
High customer concentration with two-thirds of revenue from 10 customers
Competitive pressures in the EMS industry from major players like Flex Ltd., Jabil Inc., and Foxconn
controversies: Legal challenges related to labor practices, including allegations of unfair labor practices and failure to provide mandated meal and rest periods in California
Ethical concerns regarding working conditions in some global facilities
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives aiming for net-zero emissions by 2050
social_issues: Labor disputes and ethical concerns in global operations
Potential reputational risks from labor practices
governance_issues: Recent board and leadership changes, including the appointment of Amar Maletira to the Board of Directors in January 2025
